attributes.action: Dissallow unelected persons from taking government positions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming a regular occurance that people that have not gone through any elective process are gaining office in government.
The government post are there to be held by persons elected by the majority and not to be held due to a form of nepitism.
It is beyond belief to the point of complete anger that the EU commission are unelected elitist; never mind our own shambles of a government.
